医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
Wiley宣布了其Wiley天然产品标识符的最新版本威利（Wiley）是世界上最大的出版商之一，也是研究与学习的全球领导者，今天宣布了2025年发行的Wiley天然产品标识符（Antibase Library + Chemwindow）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/wiley-announces-latest-ratest-release-olease-filey-wiley-wiley-indistifier-natural-products.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/wiley-announces-latest-ratest-release-olease-filey-wiley-wiley-indistifier-of-natural-products.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=545ffb2c-0b8c-415c-998e-474fdc34e885 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 23:57:00 -0400 Wiley announces latest release of its Wiley Identifier of Natural Products
白天和季节影响哮喘测试结果剑桥研究人员发现，用于帮助诊断哮喘的肺功能测试在早晨效果更好，全天变得不那么可靠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/time-of-day-and-and-season-aseason-Affect-asthma-test-results.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/time-of-day-and-and-season-aseason-Affect-asthma-test-results.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=238f7ABC-3376-4B0C-B1EF-524CBDE7D108 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 23:44:26 -0400 Time of day and season affect asthma test results
开创性的疫苗研究为结束非洲脑膜炎提供了希望马里兰大学医学院（UMSOM）的研究人员帮助进行了一项重要的全球健康研究，该研究发现了一种疫苗，可防止撒哈拉以南非洲疾病的五种脑膜炎菌株，可在9个月大的幼儿中安全有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/groundBreaking-Vaccine-Study-offers-hope-for-for-for-for-for-dend-dend-meningitis-in-africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/groundbreaking-vaccine-study offers-hope-for-for-for-for-for-dend-meningitis-in-africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878b6f3b-22f1-4623-aeb4-aeb4-b934c8ece04c Tue, 11 Mar 2025 23:40:07 -0400 Groundbreaking vaccine study offers hope for ending meningitis in Africa
营养干预措施可能有助于预防和治疗布鲁利溃疡根据萨里大学的一项新研究，社区一级的营养干预措施可能是预防和治疗“吃肉”皮肤感染的最佳方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/nutritional-interventions-may-help-prevent-and-treat-buruli-ulcer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/nutritional-interventions-may-help-prevent-prevent-and-treat-buruli-ulcer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=228DC01C-196A-4DF9-B9CF-05C12BAF9991 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 23:07:51 -0400 Nutritional interventions may help prevent and treat Buruli ulcer
将戒烟支持与NHS交谈疗法结合起来增加了戒烟率BATH大学由UK Cancer Research资助的研究于2025年发表的《癌症研究》（Cancer Research）资助，该研究表明，将戒烟支持纳入NHS的抑郁症和焦虑疗法会增加退出率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/combining-smoking-cessation-cessation-support-nhs-talking-talking-therapies-therapies-increases-quit quit-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/combining-smoking-cessation-cessation-support-nhs-talking-talking-therapies-increases-increases-quit-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be72fd0f-0249-491b-9dd8-b0c3bc833176 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 23:04:00 -0400 Combining smoking cessation support with NHS Talking Therapies increases quit rates
研究描绘了历史悠久的黑人学院和大学的学生福祉的复杂图片密歇根大学公共卫生学院的研究人员说，与其他机构的同伴相比，历史悠久的黑人学院和大学（HBCUS）和主要是黑人机构（PBIS）在几个关键领域的心理健康成果更好，同时也面临着需要注意的明显挑战的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/Study-paints-a-complex-picture-of-student-well-being-at-Historically-Black-Colleges-and-Universities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/study-paints-a-complex-picture-of-student-well-being-being-being-a at-historically-historical-black-colleges and-universities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96f53253-2A9D-452C-B723-838A2F1652BD Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:58:13 -0400 Study paints a complex picture of student well-being at Historically Black Colleges and Universities
新的疟疾控制策略针对蚊子中的蛋白质系统根据约翰·霍普金斯·彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项研究，蚊子蚊子中的分子质量控制系统是负责世界大多数疟疾病例的物种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-malaria-controll-strategy-targets-protein-system-system-system-system-system-mosquitoes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-malaria-control-strategy-trategy-targets-protein-system-system-system-system-mosquitoes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01B11024-6578-40C5-A62F-DFD8D8D8C676B8 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:54:01 -0400 New malaria control strategy targets protein system in mosquitoes
新的移动应用程序有助于恢复中风后的偏瘫巴西研究人员开发了一种手机应用程序，该应用程序有助于康复遭受中风的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-mobile-app-aids-in-rehabilitating-hemiparesis-following-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-mobile-app-aids-in-rehabilitating-hemiparesis-following-stroke-stroke-stroke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb144cba-AA5D-4573-A218-6456B38AB117 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:48:45 -0400 New mobile app aids in rehabilitating hemiparesis following stroke
COVID-19大流行在欧洲造成了无残障生命的重大丧失Among 289 million adults in 18 European countries, more than 16 million years of life were lost from 2020 through 2022 due to the COVID-19 pandemic, according to a new study published March 11th in the open-access journal PLOS Medicine by Sara Ahmadi-Abhari of Imperial College London, UK, and colleagues. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/covid-19-pandemic-caused-simendificant-loss-loss-loss-loss-fies-free-life-life-in-europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/covid-19-pandemic-caused-simendificant-loss-loss-loss-loss-fies-free-life-life-in-europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=BB8F5C37-0F48-4BE3-84CC-76F2A2E1A365 Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:37:45 -0400 COVID-19 pandemic caused significant loss of disability-free life in Europe
新方法表明有望发现潜在的败血症治疗免疫系统通常可以提高人体的防御能力，以清除入侵的威胁而没有问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-promise-promise-pover-potential-sepsis-sepsis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250311/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-formise-pover-potential-sepsis-sepsis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AA3750CC-FC21-446E-B920-4357F39E7F7F Tue, 11 Mar 2025 22:33:20 -0400 New approach shows promise for uncovering potential sepsis treatments
